member.name: IUIAnimationVariableCurveChangeHandler2.OnCurveChanged
member.summary: Handles events that occur when the animation curve of an animation variable changes.
member.param: The animation variable for which the animation curve has been updated.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationVariableCurveChangeHandler2
member.summary: Defines a method for handling animation curve update events.
